title: HTML Canvas Lines

metadata.description: Learn about HTML Canvas Lines with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<script>
// Create a Canvas:
const canvas = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
// Define a new path
ctx.beginPath();
// Set a start-point
ctx.moveTo(0, 0);
// Set an end-point
ctx.lineTo(200, 100);
// Stroke it (Do the Drawing)
ctx.stroke();
</script>
